唯二.definition: (slang) (adjective) (of one thing) one of the only two; (of two things) the only two

唯利是圖.definition: (idiom) to be bent solely on profit; to put profit before everything else

唯心主義.definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness

唯心論.definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness

唯恐.definition: for fear that; lest; also written 惟恐

唯恐天下不亂.pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4
唯恐天下不亂.definition: to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)

唯意志論.definition: voluntarism; metaphysical view, esp. due to Schopenhauer 叔本華|叔本华[Shu1 ben3 hua2], that the essence of the world is willpower

唯物主義.definition: materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality

唯獨.definition: only; just (i.e. it is only that...); all except; unique

唯粉.definition: fan who only likes one particular member of a pop idol band

唯識宗.definition: Yogachara school of Buddhism ("consciousness only" school of Buddhism)

唯飯.definition: fan who only likes one particular member of a pop idol band
